name: Doctor Who Series 11 Recreation Tardis Interior
name_original: Doctor Who Series 11 Recreation Tardis Interior
description:
I decided to do this the Doctor Who Series 11 Tardis Console room has a very interesting new design, unlike previous console rooms this one has had a lot of publicity, images and extra videos outside the program Doctor Who itself. This being a recreation project I aim to model the console room accurately to the set used in the TV show. I think reference is key to any project, I don’t think you can ever do to much, especially for this project. I wouldn’t have had the idea and picked to do it if there was just to little image reference of it.

I only had time to work on this for 3 weeks. I worked a lot on the models, but I ran out of time to texture and light the scene properly in Unreal to the quality I wanted.

I wish I had more time to spend on this and will continue working on it over the summer.
